Current status .
Priocnemis ( Priocnemis ) amurensis Lelej, 1988
.
Distribution . Russia : Eastern Siberia ( Irkutsk Prov. , Buryat Rep.), Far East ( Amur Prov. , Primorskii Terr.) (Loktionov & Lelej 2017).
